Name: Signet ring of Ankhes-en-pa-Aton
Description: The ring is stirrup-shaped. The band, not fully preserved, widens and thickens towards the oval bezel. On the bezel, the name Ankhes-en-pa-Aton is incised in left-facing hieroglyphs. She was the third daughter of Akhenaten and the wife of Tutankhamun.
